quote.issuer_name: Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. - H Shs
quote.nm: Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co., Ltd. - H Shs
quote.summary: Shanghai Realway Capital Assets Management Co Ltd is a asset management China company specializing in real estate fund management. The Company's funds portfolio covers commercial real estate projects, distressed assets projects and urbanization and redevelopment projects. The Company also engages in financial consulting services to the fund demanding parties and property lease. The Company is engaged in the management of two types of funds, including Project Funds and Fund of Funds (FOFs). The Company is also evolved in wealth management business, mainly offering one-stop services in family wealth management, including global asset allocation, tax planning, legal advice, with a view to assisting families with the achievement of their wealth goals. The Company operates its businesses in the domestic market.
quote.office_address:
